name: Prison Break - Room Escape Game
description:
In the first episode your mission is to figure out how to escape the jail. The door you need to open is locked with six keys so better hurry up, convict!
Quick Escape games are short five minute brain teasers where you have to find and combine items, solve mini-puzzles and use your smartphone to escape.

Features:
Unique mini-puzzles
Items combining
Tricky brain teasers
Smartphone's magic
